title.narrative: Forest Governance Markets and Climate -Programme Facilitation

description.narrative: This activity (Forest Governance Markets and Climate -Programme Facilitation) is a component of Forest Governance, Markets and Climate reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £10,325,907. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Forestry policy and administrative management, Trade policy and administrative management, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office, KPMG East Africa, KPMG LLP, Pegasys Limited. The start date is 01-04-2011 and the end date is 30-04-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
